t.t-esc: car.model_id.brand_id.name + '/' + car.model_id.name + u' \u2022 ' + str(round(car.total_depreciated_cost, 2)) + u' € \u2022 ' + car._get_acquisition_date()

div.span: The cost of a car is depreciated by 8% per year, for 7 years. So, your gross salary increases automatically to keep the same employee budget. Once a car has 7 years, the car is fully depreciated and the only remaining costs are the maintenance, insurances and taxes.
This cost simulation is only for information. If you want to choose another car model, please contact your HR manager.
Enter the monthly amount you spend on public transportation to go to work. The approximative amount reimbursed by the employer is calculated accordingly.

div.label: + International Communication
div.span: Your mobile phone subscription will be paid up to this amount.
The number of days you get depends on your working schedule, the number of days used in your previous job and the number of months worked previously.

div.name: holidays_20_days
div.span: You will receive 20 days of paid leaves. However, if you only use
days by the end of the year, you will receive a compensation of approximately
This is a monthly net amount, taken into account in your payslip.
This commission is only effective if the target is reached. The commissions are paid using warrants that you receive every three months. This results to a net warrant value of
Every month, you'll get 7.45€ per worked day on your meal voucher card.
You'll receive this amount in the form of Eco Vouchers around June. This amount may be different based on your working schedule and the number of worked days during the year.
You'll receive this amount around December. This amount may be different based on your working schedule and the number of worked days during the year.
You'll receive this amount around June. This amount may be different based on your working schedule and the number of worked days during the year.

div.p:
Please note that this information may be inaccurate and should be used for reference only.
The amounts are calculated based on a full time permanent contract.
Your contract has been sent to:

He/She will review your contract.
Feel free to contact him/her if you have further questions.
